label: aboutus
text: Established in 2015 Aham Solutions (HK) Ltd aims to serve the community in different ways. The first project is implementing Apps to help the members of the community to improve their communicating capacity. Tamil Read Easy and Tamil Grammar Apps were developed to help a person to learn Tamil letters and words. Gloβol is the second venture in our endeavour. About Us

label: donation
text: We are planning to expand this App in various ways and we need fund and human resources to achieve our aims. Your donations are much appreciated. Donation

label: aboutglobol
text: Other Languages: Indonesian Tagalog Korean Spanish Indian Languages: Malayalam Hindi Telugu Sanskrit Bengali Rajasthani We will be releasing words in the following languages one after the other. English Cantonese Putonghua Tamil Kannada Gloβol App will help any person to learn the basic words of different languages through their Native language. Gloβol is a venture that targets students tourists and language lovers. This project is purely a voluntary project involving various people of common interest. This starts with offering 500 words in following languages initially. About Gloβol
